post:
SupremeBytes, LLC would like to announce its new VPS server location in Los Angeles, USA with a promo for the LowEnd Talk community. You will be able to manage your own rDNS inside your SolusVM management interface. 
SupremeBytes, LLC is now BBB Accredited!

Use promocode "los-angeles" for 35% off recurring.

**OVZ-256**
256 mb RAM
20gb disk
200gb transfer
1 IPv4
up to 20 free IPv6 at request
$4 Monthly - Order: https://secure.supremebytes.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=96

**OVZ-512**
512mb RAM
50gb disk space
500gb transfer
1 IPv4
up to 20 free IPv6 at request
$7 USD Monthly - Order: https://secure.supremebytes.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=92

Use promocode "los-angeles" for 35% off recurring.

http://www.supremebytes.com/virtual-private-servers.php

We also have services in France, and New Jersey of the USA

Linux operating systems: Ubuntu 12.04, Centos5/6, Arch Linux, Suse 12.1, Debian, Fedora
(32/64 bit on all choices)
Control Panel: OpenVZ with SolusVM

**Terms of Service**
